Koishi:ImaginaryFriend.NAME: Imaginary Friend
Koishi:ImaginaryFriend.FLAVOR: They'll forget about me. They always do.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card or draw an #yId card, gain #b

Koishi:BloodstainedWhiteRose.NAME: Bloodstained White Rose
Koishi:BloodstainedWhiteRose.FLAVOR: The treaty was broken, and the White Rose of Chireiden was stained forever.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b

Koishi:LettersToReimu.NAME: Letters to Reimu
Koishi:LettersToReimu.FLAVOR: Everything comes to an end, even the dream they had believed in. Even this story must have a sad, tragic end.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain #b

Koishi:ImperfectMetamorphosis.NAME: Imperfect Metamorphosis
Koishi:ImperfectMetamorphosis.FLAVOR: It was the first day of spring, and nobody cared.

Koishi:ColorfulDays.NAME: Colorful Days
Koishi:ColorfulDays.FLAVOR: Everything I saw, everything I heard, everything I felt . . . all the scenery around me started to take color.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. #yEphemeral now triggers at #b

Koishi:AHoleWhereASisterShouldBe.NAME: A Hole Where a Sister Should Be
Koishi:AHoleWhereASisterShouldBe.FLAVOR: It hurt. It hurt to remember the sound of her laugh, the touch of her mind against her own.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you draw an #yId card each combat, gain [E] and draw #b

Koishi:TeethAndClaws.NAME: Teeth and Claws
Koishi:TeethAndClaws.FLAVOR: Not everyone plays by the rules. Those who donâ€™t tend to be dealt with. Swiftly.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you apply a debuff each turn, gain #b

Koishi:EchoesOfADeadGirl.NAME: Echoes of a Dead Girl
Koishi:EchoesOfADeadGirl.FLAVOR: She wasn't sure if there was anything left of her sister in that shell, that hollow existence that could only mindlessly follow its primal urges.
